params.owner: The address of the account which owns the tokens to be spent
params.spender: The address of the account which may transfer tokens

returns.remaining: uint256 The number of tokens allowed to be spent (-1 means infinite)

approve(address,uint256).details: This will overwrite the approval amount for `spender`  and is subject to issues noted [here](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-20#approve)

params.amount: The number of tokens that are approved (-1 means infinite)
params.spender: The address of the account which may transfer tokens

returns.success: bool Whether or not the approval succeeded

asset().details: Returns the address of the underlying token used for the Vault for accounting, depositing, and withdrawing.

params.owner: The address from which the balance will be retrieved

params.user: The user to get the underlying balance of.

returns.balance: The user's Vault balance in underlying tokens.

params.to: The address to receive shares corresponding to the deposit
params.underlyingAmount: The amount of the underlying token to deposit.

returns.shares: The shares in the vault credited to `to`

params.shareAmount: The amount of vault shares to mint.
params.to: The address to receive shares corresponding to the mint.

returns.underlyingAmount: The amount of the underlying tokens deposited from the mint call.

params.underlyingAmount: the input amount of underlying tokens

returns.shareAmount: the corresponding amount of shares out from a deposit call with `underlyingAmount` in

params.shareAmount: the amount of shares from a mint call.

returns.underlyingAmount: the amount of underlying tokens corresponding to the mint call

params.shareAmount: the amount of shares from a redeem call.

returns.underlyingAmount: the amount of underlying tokens corresponding to the redeem call

params.underlyingAmount: the input amount of underlying tokens

returns.shareAmount: the corresponding amount of shares out from a withdraw call with `underlyingAmount` in

params.from: The address to burn shares from corresponding to the redemption.
params.shareAmount: The amount of shares to redeem.
params.to: The address to receive underlying corresponding to the redemption.

returns._0: The total amount of underlying tokens the Vault manages.

params.amount: The number of tokens to transfer
params.dst: The address of the destination account

returns.success: bool Whether or not the transfer succeeded

params.amount: The number of tokens to transfer
params.dst: The address of the destination account
params.src: The address of the source account

returns.success: bool Whether or not the transfer succeeded

params.from: The address to burn shares from corresponding to the withdrawal.
params.to: The address to receive underlying corresponding to the withdrawal.
params.underlyingAmount: The amount of the underlying token to withdraw.

returns.shares: The shares in the vault burned from sender

allowance(address,address).notice: Get the current allowance from `owner` for `spender`

approve(address,uint256).notice: Approve `spender` to transfer up to `amount` from `src`

balanceOf(address).notice: Gets the balance of the specified address

balanceOfUnderlying(address).notice: Returns a user's Vault balance in underlying tokens.

deposit(uint256,address).notice: Deposit a specific amount of underlying tokens.

exchangeRate().notice: Returns the value in underlying terms of one vault token.

mint(uint256,address).notice: Mint an exact amount of shares for a variable amount of underlying tokens.

previewDeposit(uint256).notice: Returns the amount of vault tokens that would be obtained if depositing a given amount of underlying tokens in a `deposit` call.

previewMint(uint256).notice: Returns the amount of underlying tokens that would be deposited if minting a given amount of shares in a `mint` call.

previewRedeem(uint256).notice: Returns the amount of underlying tokens that would be obtained if redeeming a given amount of shares in a `redeem` call.

previewWithdraw(uint256).notice: Returns the amount of vault tokens that would be burned if withdrawing a given amount of underlying tokens in a `withdraw` call.

redeem(uint256,address,address).notice: Redeem a specific amount of shares for underlying tokens.

totalAssets().notice: Calculates the total amount of underlying tokens the Vault manages.

totalSupply().notice: Get the total number of tokens in circulation

withdraw(uint256,address,address).notice: Withdraw a specific amount of underlying tokens.
